### normalize_text_upper

``` python

def normalize_text_upper(
    text:str
)->str:

```

*Normalize text by trimming whitespace and lowercasing.*

``` python
def test_normalize_text_upper():
    assert normalize_text_upper(" Hello ") == "HELLO"
    assert normalize_text_upper("world") == "WORLD"
```
